title: inbattai enna solvEn
sahitya:
inbattai enna koNDEn manat-tunbattai mATrik-koNDEn


anupallavi

  anbarukk-anbanAm harihara rUpanAm ayyan ennuyirinai uyyak-koNDANDadum


caraNam    avalai ninaittukkoNDE umiyai melluginra savalai ulaginilE sankaTappaDAmal
kavalai tuDaikka vanda kaNkaNDa deivamE un gAna pUjaiyAlE shuddhAnanda nilai perum
